<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="it">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Niccol√≤ Di Cintio - Research Fellow NICO</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e3c72 0%, #2a5298 50%, #7e8ba3 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .container {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 40px;
            max-width: 520px;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }

        .profile-section {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .profile-image {
            width: 140px;
            height: 140px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(30, 60, 114, 0.3);
            background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,');
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
        }

        h1 {
            color: #1e3c72;
            font-size: 28px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .title {
            color: #555;
            font-size: 16px;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .institution {
            color: #2a5298;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 600;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .research-area {
            background: #f8f9fa;
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin-top: 15px;
            border-left: 3px solid #2a5298;
        }

        .research-area-title {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #666;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .research-area-content {
            font-size: 13px;
            color: #1e3c72;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .skills-section {
            background: #f8f9fa;
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        .skills-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #1e3c72;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        }

        .skills-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .skill-category {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #555;
        }

        .skill-category strong {
            color: #2a5298;
        }

        .contact-list {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .contact-item {
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            animation: slideIn 0.6s ease-out backwards;
        }

        .contact-item:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
        .contact-item:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
        .contact-item:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
        .contact-item:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
        .contact-item:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }
        .contact-item:nth-child(6) { animation-delay: 0.6s; }

        @keyframes slideIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateX(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateX(0);
            }
        }

        .contact-link {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 14px;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 10px;
            text-decoration: none;
            color: #333;
            border: 2px solid #f0f0f0;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .contact-link:hover {
            border-color: #2a5298;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(42, 82, 152, 0.2);
        }

        .icon {
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            margin-right: 15px;
            fill: #2a5298;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .contact-text {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 0;
        }

        .contact-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            color: #999;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        }

        .contact-value {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 500;
            white-space: nowrap;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
        }

        .arrow {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            fill: #ccc;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .contact-link:hover .arrow {
            transform: translateX(5px);
            fill: #2a5298;
        }

        .footer {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .download-vcard {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 12px 24px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2a5298 0%, #1e3c72 100%);
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .download-vcard:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(42, 82, 152, 0.3);
        }

        .logo-section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 25px;
            padding-top: 20px;
            border-top: 1px solid #eee;
        }

        .logo {
            height: 35px;
            opacity: 0.7;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .logo:hover {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .container {
                padding: 30px 20px;
            }
            
            h1 {
                font-size: 24px;
            }

            .contact-value {
                font-size: 13px;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

    <script>
        function downloadVCard() {
            // Dati per il file vCard
            const vCardData = [
                'BEGIN:VCARD',
                'VERSION:3.0',
                'N:Di Cintio;Niccol√≤;;;', // Cognome;Nome;;;
                'FN:Niccol√≤ Di Cintio', // Nome Completo
                'ORG:University of Turin;Neuroscience Institute Cavalieri Ottolenghi (NICO)', // Organizzazione;Dipartimento
                'TITLE:Research Fellow',
                'TEL;TYPE=CELL:+393455998634',
                'EMAIL;TYPE=PREF,INTERNET:niccolo.dicintio@unito.it',
                'URL;TYPE=LinkedIn:https://www.linkedin.com/in/niccolo-di-cintio/',
                'URL;TYPE=ORCID:https://orcid.org/0009-0003-4277-9905',
                'URL;TYPE=Work:https://nico.ottolenghi.unito.it/gruppi-di-ricerca/fisiopatologia-delle-cellule-staminali-cerebrali/ricercatori/',
                'END:VCARD'
            ].join('\n');

            // Creazione del file
            const blob = new Blob([vCardData], { type: 'text/vcard;charset=utf-t' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

            // Trigger del download
            const link = document.createElement('a');
            link.href = url;
            link.setAttribute('download', 'Niccolo_Di_Cintio.vcf');
            document.body.appendChild(link);
            link.click();
            document.body.removeChild(link);
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }
    </script>
